product_identification.name: Ergonomic High-Back Mesh Office Chair with Adjustable Features
product_identification.intended_use: For standard office workstations requiring ergonomic seating solutions for employees working 6-8 hours daily in desk-based environments.

technical_requirements.dimensions: Overall Height: 45-50 inches (114.3-127 cm); Seat Width: 19-20 inches (48.3-50.8 cm); Seat Depth: 17-19 inches (43.2-48.3 cm) adjustable; Backrest Height: 22-24 inches (55.9-61 cm) from seat
materials: Frame: Die-cast aluminum or high-strength reinforced nylon
Base: 5-star configuration, minimum 26-inch diameter, aluminum or reinforced nylon
Backrest: Breathable mesh with minimum tensile strength of 200 lbs
Seat Cushion: High-density foam minimum 1.8 lb/ft³
Upholstery: Fabric with minimum 100,000 double rubs (Wyzenbeek method)
Casters: Dual-wheel design, appropriate for carpet and hard floor surfaces

adjustability_features: Seat Height: Adjustable between 16-21 inches (40.6-53.3 cm) from floor
Lumbar Support: Adjustable in height and depth
Armrests: 3D or 4D adjustable (height, width, and pivot)
Backrest: Recline capability of 95-120 degrees with tension control
Seat Pan: Forward/backward tilt of 0-5 degrees
Headrest: Adjustable in height and angle
ergonomic_standards: Meets or exceeds OSHA ergonomic recommendations for office seating

certifications: ANSI/BIFMA X5.1-2017 certification for Office Chairs
Greenguard Gold Certification for low chemical emissions
testing_requirements: Drop test from 6 inches for stability verification

environmental_considerations: VOC emissions compliant with ANSI/BIFMA X7.1-2011
Disassembly instructions for proper recycling at end of life
Packaging made from minimum 50% recycled materials

identified_issues.issue_description: Screen size is imprecisely specified with 'approximately 24"' and lacks diagonal measurement clarification
identified_issues.correction: Screen Size: 23.8-inch diagonal (60.5 cm) with 16:9 aspect ratio, measured corner to corner

identified_issues.issue_description: Resolution is described as 'Good quality' which is subjective and lacks specific technical parameters
identified_issues.correction: Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels (Full HD/1080p) with minimum 96 PPI (pixels per inch)

identified_issues.issue_description: Response time is vaguely described as 'Fast' without measurable specifications
identified_issues.correction: Response Time: Maximum 5ms gray-to-gray (GtG) at standard mode; maximum 1ms MPRT (Moving Picture Response Time) in gaming mode

identified_issues.issue_description: Connectivity is listed as 'Multiple ports' without specifying types, quantities, or standards
identified_issues.correction: Connectivity: Minimum 1x HDMI 1.4 (or higher), 1x DisplayPort 1.2 (or higher), 1x USB Type-C with DisplayPort Alt Mode, 2x USB 3.0 downstream ports

identified_issues.issue_description: Performance requirements are subjective with terms like 'work well,' 'clear display,' and 'sufficient brightness'
identified_issues.correction: Performance Requirements: Minimum brightness of 250 cd/m² (nits), contrast ratio of at least 1000:1 static, color gamut minimum 99% sRGB, viewing angles of at least 178° horizontal and vertical
